entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
